html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-16672011-12-15,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActOffice of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Act
Pension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
SubjectAssessment of Pension Plans Regulations
PrecisASSESSMENT OF PENSION PLANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) support the move of the assessment authority from the Pension Benefits Standards Act, 1985 to the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Act; (2) set out the formula used to calculate plan assessments effective April 1, 2012; (3) make modest adjustments to the formula, primarily to better align annual assessments with the costs of supervising and regulating pension plans by including retirees and other beneficiaries; and (4) provide for the transition from the old formula to the new formula.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0317 Publication Date: 2012-01-04
AttachmentsAttachment

precis: ASSESSMENT OF PENSION PLANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) support the move of the assessment authority from the Pension Benefits Standards Act, 1985 to the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Act; (2) set out the formula used to calculate plan assessments effective April 1, 2012; (3) make modest adjustments to the formula, primarily to better align annual assessments with the costs of supervising and regulating pension plans by including retirees and other beneficiaries; and (4) provide for the transition from the old formula to the new formula.
